name: Aceternity UI
description: A globe animation as seen on GitHub's homepage. Interactive and customizable.

props.Description: Optional. Size of the points on the globe.
Optional. Color of the globe.
Optional. Whether to show the atmosphere layer.
Optional. Color of the atmosphere.
Optional. Altitude of the atmosphere layer.
Optional. Emissive color of the globe material.
Optional. Intensity of the emissive color.
Optional. Shininess of the globe material.
Optional. Color of the polygons on the globe.
Optional. Color of the ambient light in the scene.
Optional. Color of the directional light from the left.
Optional. Color of the directional light from the top.
Optional. Color of the point light in the scene.
Optional. Animation time for the arcs.
Optional. Length of the dash in the arc animations.
Optional. Number of rings to display initially.
Optional. Maximum number of rings that can be displayed.
Optional. Initial position of the globe. Containslatandlngfields.
Optional. Whether the globe should auto-rotate.
Optional. Speed of the auto-rotation.

usage_notes: A globe animation as seen on GitHub's homepage. Interactive and customizable.
